General.Name: Time Finance PLC
General.Description: Time Finance plc, together with its subsidiaries, provides financial products and services to consumers and businesses in the United Kingdom. It operates through four segments: Asset Finance, Vehicle Finance, Loan Finance, and Invoice Finance. The company offers vendor finance, hire purchase, finance leasing, asset-based lending, and invoice finance; business loans comprising unsecured, secured, and VAT loans; property finance, including second charge mortgages, bridging loans, and specialist but-to-let loans; recovery loan schemes; and vehicle finance solutions. The company was formerly known as 1pm plc and changed its name to Time Finance plc in December 2020. Time Finance plc was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Bath, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: St James House, The Square, Bath, United Kingdom, BA2 3BH
